March  

The Student Association Internal Affairs Committee tonight will further discuss bylaw revisions including the removal of the Programming and Activities committee and the Student Committee on Political Education PERIOD

The revisions must get final approval from the SA senate PERIOD

Diana Turowski committee member suggested at the Feb PERIOD  meeting to recommend removal of the Programming and Activities Committee PERIOD

Turowski said IAC should recommend a liaison between the SA and the Campus Activities Board PERIOD

The committee also will recommend the removal of SCOPE PERIOD SA Vice President Cam Davis said the committee will vote for the mergence of SCOPE with the Student Committee on Political Action PERIOD SCOPA promotes involvement while SCOPE promotes learning Davis said PERIOD

Discussion on this issue will continue in the SA conference room at  p.m PERIOD

At the March  meeting member Becky Doetsch suggested the removal of the International Relations Committee with some of its bylaws combined with the Minority Relations Committee PERIOD

Minority Relations Adviser Larry Robertson said Its already understood that international relations students are a minority. at the March  meeting member Gregg Bliss suggested the implementations of bylaws which clarify in categories how organizations could be recognized for funding PERIOD

Bliss said they are trying to make provisions for organizations that arent recognized or are about to be recognized. advertisement

The Northern Star is the studentproduced independent media at Northern Illinois University in DeKalb Ill PERIOD and is a limited public forum whose content is determined exclusively by its student editors PERIOD Information presented on this website and in its print products is not controlled by NIU administration faculty or staff PERIOD The Star publishes online at northernstar.info and sends out its TLDR newsletter Monday through Friday PERIOD

The Northern Star is the studentproduced independent media at Northern Illinois University in DeKalb Ill PERIOD The Northern Star covers NIU campus news DeKalb news NIU Huskie sports and northern Illinois entertainment PERIOD
